Item.comments: onBeforeUpdate to support method "Copy FolderTeam to SubStructure"
Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break()
Dim SQLstr = "SELECT [Item_folder].team_id,[Item_folder].related_project_keyed_name FROM [Item_folder] WHERE [Item_folder].id='" & Me.GetID() & "'" Dim thisFolderItem As Item = Me.getInnovator().applySQL(SQLstr)
'save previous values to context RequestState.Add("prevRelatedProjectKN",thisFolderItem.getProperty("related_project_keyed_name","")) RequestState.Add("prevTeamId",thisFolderItem.getProperty("team_id","")) return Me
Item.name: Add to Ctxt to Copy FolderTeam
